headers.name: Modern Navigation Header
headers.description: Clean, modern header with logo, horizontal navigation, and CTA button

headers.name: Creative Centered Header
headers.description: Centered logo with creative navigation and social links

headers.name: Dark Modern Header
headers.description: Sleek dark header with gradient accents and modern styling

headers.name: Professional Services Header
headers.description: Clean, trustworthy header for professional service businesses with contact info

headers.name: Healthcare & Medical Header
headers.description: Trustworthy header for healthcare and medical services with appointment booking
headers.template:
'use client' import Link from 'next/link' import { useState } from 'react' import { Menu, X, Phone, Clock, Calendar, User } from 'lucide-react' interface HeaderProps { logo: string navigation: Array<{ label: string; href: string }> ctaText: string ctaHref: string emergencyPhone: string patientPortalHref?: string } export default function Header({ logo, navigation, ctaText, ctaHref, emergencyPhone, patientPortalHref }: HeaderProps) { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false) return ( <> {/* Emergency/Hours Bar */}
Emergency: {emergencyPhone}
Mon-Fri 8AM-6PM | Sat 9AM-2PM
{patientPortalHref && ( Patient Portal )}
{/* Main Header */}
{logo}
{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.label} ))}
{ctaText}
{isMenuOpen && (
{navigation.map((item) => ( setIsMenuOpen(false)} > {item.label} ))} setIsMenuOpen(false)} > {ctaText}
)}
) }

headers.name: Restaurant & Hospitality Header

{contactInfo.hours}
{contactInfo.address}
{contactInfo.phone}
{/* Main Header */}
{logo}
{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.label} ))}
{ctaText}
{isMenuOpen && (
{navigation.map((item) => ( setIsMenuOpen(false)} > {item.label} ))} setIsMenuOpen(false)} > {ctaText}
)}
) }

headers.name: Real Estate Header
headers.description: Professional header for real estate services with property search and agent contact

'use client' import Link from 'next/link' import { useState } from 'react' import { Menu, X, Search, Phone, Mail, Home, MapPin } from 'lucide-react' interface HeaderProps { logo: string navigation: Array<{ label: string; href: string }> ctaText: string ctaHref: string agentInfo: { name: string phone: string email: string } searchHref: string } export default function Header({ logo, navigation, ctaText, ctaHref, agentInfo, searchHref }: HeaderProps) { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false) return ( <> {/* Agent Info Bar */}
{agentInfo.name} - Licensed Real Estate Agent
{agentInfo.phone}
{agentInfo.email}
{/* Main Header */}
{logo}
{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.label} ))}
Search Properties {ctaText}
{isMenuOpen && (
{navigation.map((item) => ( setIsMenuOpen(false)} > {item.label} ))} setIsMenuOpen(false)} > Search Properties setIsMenuOpen(false)} > {ctaText}
)}
) }

headers.name: E-commerce Header

Free shipping on orders over $50
Track Order Help
{/* Main Header */}
{logo}
{/* Search Bar */}
{/* Right Side Icons */}
2 3
{/* Navigation Bar */}
{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.label} ))}
{/* Mobile Menu */} {isMenuOpen && (
{navigation.map((item) => ( setIsMenuOpen(false)} > {item.label} ))}
)}
) }
